title: Vegetarian Food
description: Primarily buffet-style vegetarian food eatery that's all vegan. Menu is in Thai, staff speak Thai only. Basic Thai fare that is chosen from pots of pre-cooked food served with red rice. Steamed rice flour rolls, noodle stir fry, and noodle soups also available. Directions: heading away from Tesco towards the main bus station, it's on the right-hand side just before the Night Market, and opposite Supavet Tayakom School.
